meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uppity.
meanings.sent1: Her uppitinesses was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His uppitinesses made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her uppitinesses, she couldn't resist laughing at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The uppitinesses of the cat as it walked by was unmistakable.
meanings.sent5: The uppitinesses of the queen was known throughout the land.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude of being snobbish or arrogant.
meanings.sent1: The uppitinesses of the celebrity was off-putting to many fans.
meanings.sent2: His uppitinesses at the party made everyone feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his uppitinesses, he secretly enjoyed the simple pleasures of life.
meanings.sent4: The uppitinesses of the peacock as it strutted around was comical.
meanings.sent5: Her uppitinesses shone through in the way she spoke to the waiter.
